bullets: Built an AI-driven platform to automate critical engineering workflows, enabling self-service across teams and saving over 1,100 engineering hours.
Developed testing framework with service virtualization and automated infrastructure management that accelerated feedback cycles by enabling continuous testing.
Created a comprehensive playwright test suite for rocket mortgage servicing website with CI/CD integration that reduced regression and manual testing efforts by 60% per sprint.
Standardized performance testing across engineering teams by delivering a K6 template for CI/CD pipelines; adopted by 30+ microservices and improved visibility into performance regressions.
Led 5-member team to automate and maintain 1200+ tests for BarnesAndNoble.com using selenium, reviewed daily runs and reported defects tied to feature updates.
Supported root cause analysis by replicating production performance issues in lower environments and contributed to test estimation and planning for automation initiatives.
Involved in creating end-to-end regression tests using HP UFT & Selenium.
Led teams in offshore onsite model in delivering regression automation for multiple projects.

Responsible for running ETL jobs and load test data into lower environments.
Responsible for executing functional and end-to-end manual test cases.
